attributes.action: encourage courts to name and shame antisocial offenders as an increased deterrent, in some cases by re-introducing a modern day version of the public stocks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What about a modern day version of the medieval stocks? It would be a secure glass box placed in your local shopping centre. The guilty sit inside where everyone can see them. They hold up signs detailing their offences. The courts could sentence them to sit on display for a specified number of hours or days. Take a Break magazine says it's time to show the yobs what shame really means.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
